title: Zigg's Q not visible if Ziggs is not visible.

replies.body:
Not correct at all, i just witnessed about 5 or 6 dozen ziggs Qs with ziggs in brush or out of sight. They are definitely visible.

Sounds like bad internet problems, or a map-specific bug (where did this happen?)

Summoner's Rift.  Our base was being sieged.  I was behind the wall, and he was on the other side.  The only animation was the explosion after I died.  As for internet problems, my ping is stable around 40 ms.  I don't really experience packet loss, nor spikes in latency.
hey same with veigar E and multiple other spells
